title: Pairing Cigars & Art With Back2Back
itunes:title: Pairing Cigars & Art With Back2Back
description:
It’s the backwards show! This week we do everything backwards as we welcome urban artists 2ESAE and SKI better known as URNY and the duo behind Back to Back Cigars and the rebranding of Zino Platinum Exclusive Series. The duo was in town to finish the kick-ass mural on Two Guys Smoke Shop in Nashua, NH now that the cold weather has finally broke.

In the first hour we light up the Back 2 Back Nicaragua Robusto from the care package as we sit down with the Brooklyn Duo as we find out if Dave likes the art that now covers his building. Dave will have a doozy of a story about what happened from the first time they were here in October.

In the second hour we will fire up the Back 2 Back Connecticut as we continue our art conversation with URNY.

Join us on The Cigar Authority, the most listened to cigar podcast in the world. We will have all the usual suspects including Versus, Offer of the Day, Cigar News and a peek into the Asylum.

The Cigar Authority is a member of the United Podcast Network and is recorded live in front of a studio audience at Studio 21 Podcast Cafe upstairs at Two Guys Smoke Shop in Salem, NH and as always you can find many of the cigars we discuss at http://www.2GuysCigars.com/.
